{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Central Hub|It|Central Hub}} is located above the Silver Bottle Courtyard, and features a giant wheel. Initially, the wheel is stationary, but it begins rotating again during {{Quest|Back to Normal: The Story Hidden in the Bottle}}. It then turns into a ride similar to a {{w|Ferris wheel}}.</p>}}

There is also a [[Luxurious Chest]] next to the billboard.
